name: WordPress
description: Integrate with WordPress to list, create, update and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Posts
tools.description: List posts from a WordPress site. Optionally filter by status, category, search, or author.

tools.name: Create Post
tools.description: Create a new post on a WordPress site. Provide a title, content, and optional status and categories.

tools.name: Update Post
tools.description: Update an existing post on a WordPress site. Can change title, content, status, and other fields.

tools.name: List Pages
tools.description: List pages from a WordPress site. Returns page titles, statuses, and slugs.

tools.name: List Comments
tools.description: List comments from a WordPress site. Optionally filter by post, status, or author.

siteUrl.label: WordPress Site URL
siteUrl.description: The full URL of your WordPress site
